title: Standard Terminology
content: Standard terminology removes ambiguity. When everyone uses the same terms for the same things, miscommunication drops. Learn and use your operation's standard language. Avoid slang, abbreviations unknown to receivers, and improvised terms. Consistency in language creates consistency in understanding.

mcq.question: A new team member uses different terminology than your operation's standard. What should happen?

options.A: Adapt to their language—communication should be flexible
options.B: They should learn and use standard terminology
options.D: Language doesn't matter if intent is clear

mcq.explanation: Standard terminology exists to prevent miscommunication. New team members adopt the standard, not the other way around. This isn't inflexibility—it's error prevention.
